医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
PCORI 拨款 2.08 亿美元资助 17 项新的临床有效性比较研究以患者为中心的结果研究所 (PCORI) 今天宣布拨款总额为 2.08 亿美元，用于支持 17 项新的比较临床有效性研究 (CER) 研究，其中包括四项规模和范围特别大、涉及复杂问题的试验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/PCORI-awards-24208-million-to-fund-17-new-comparative-clinical-effectness-research-studies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/PCORI-awards-24208-million-to-fund-17-new-comparative-clinical-effectness-research-studies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7d897ff-973b-40d5-9143-dc3a7340325b Tue, 18 Jul 2023 12:17:20 -0400 PCORI awards $208 million to fund 17 new comparative clinical effectiveness research studies
母亲之间的母乳抗体差异很大根据匹兹堡大学医学院的一项新的《实验医学杂志》研究，每个人的母乳中都含有独特的抗体组合，这些抗体在整个哺乳期和怀孕期间都非常稳定。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Breast-milk-antibodies-vary-widely-among-mothers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Breast-milk-antibodies-vary-widely-among-mothers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3618850f-b3e1-4ef7-a375-5b953bc57c3a Tue, 18 Jul 2023 12:10:52 -0400 Breast milk antibodies vary widely among mothers
阿片类药物会增加患有痴呆症的老年人的死亡风险研究人群包括丹麦2008年1月1日至2018年12月31日期间被诊断患有痴呆症的65岁及以上的所有人（n=75,471），包括居家居民和疗养院居民。在该群体中，42% (31,619) 被诊断患有痴呆症的人在药房兑换了阿片类药物的处方。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Opioid-linked-to-increased-risk-of-death-in-older-adults-with-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Opioid-linked-to-increased-risk-of-death-in-older-adults-with-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=91c62b10-c1e3-4b6f-a94c-3e585dc2cc5a Tue, 18 Jul 2023 12:06:07 -0400 Opioids linked to increased risk of death in older adults with dementia
艾伦研究所和礼来公司合作开发免疫介导疾病的新疗法对于艾伦免疫学研究所（艾伦研究所的一个部门）来说，这是一个重要的里程碑，研究人员和工作人员将与私营行业研究人员合作，帮助对疾病进行详细的分子了解，以开发新的治疗方法和疗法来改善人类健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Allen-Institute-and-Lilly-collaborate-to-develop-new-treatments-for-immune-mediated-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Allen-Institute-and-Lilly-collaborate-to-develop-new-treatments-for-immune-mediad-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20db8e39-7b0e-4be2-a5b3-e95d69b03005 Tue, 18 Jul 2023 11:05:28 -0400 Allen Institute and Lilly collaborate to develop new treatments for immune-mediated diseases
埃利亚斯家族向 MD 安德森癌症中心的捐赠将有助于推进脑肿瘤和癌症神经科学研究德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心今天宣布，Howard 和 Susan Elias 捐赠了 1625 万美元，用于加速脑肿瘤和癌症神经科学研究，这是一个专注于整合神经系统在癌症中的作用的新兴领域。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Elias-familys-gift-to-MD-Anderson-will-help-advance-brain-tumor-and-cancer-neuroscience-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Elias-familys-gift-to-MD-Anderson-will-help-advance-brain-tumor-and-cancer-neuroscience-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0b481be3-d346-4105-9c52-c69107a71988 Tue, 18 Jul 2023 11:00:12 -0400 Elias family's gift to MD Anderson will help advance brain tumor and cancer neuroscience research
印第安纳大学研究人员在阿尔茨海默病会议上提出突破性发现来自印第安纳大学医学院的研究人员在荷兰阿姆斯特丹举行的 2023 年阿尔茨海默病协会国际会议上发挥了重要作用并发挥了领导作用，在为期四天的会议上发表了 150 多场演讲。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/IU-researchers-present-groundwriting-findings-at-Alzheimers-conference.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/IU-researchers-present-groundwriting-findings-at-Alzheimers-conference.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c094984e-3dd7-4790-ad3b-18e49f73ed1b Tue, 18 Jul 2023 10:32:01 -0400 IU researchers present groundbreaking findings at Alzheimer's conference
细胞之间的紧密连接可能在人类胚胎原肠胚形成中发挥关键作用随着人类胚胎的生长，一组分子引导细胞繁殖并在胚胎内呈现特定的身份和空间位置。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Tight-junctions- Between-cells-may-play-a-ritic-role-in-gastrulation-in- human-embryos.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Tight-junctions- Between-cells-may-play-a-ritic-role-in-gastrulation-in- human-embryos.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd112da7-eb4b-47d9-a40c-603bee89be9f Tue, 18 Jul 2023 09:45:03 -0400 Tight junctions between cells may play a critical role in gastrulation in human embryos
磁化率作为预测帕金森病未来严重程度的有前景的标志物研究人员评估定量磁化率图检测帕金森病进展的量化标记。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Magnetic-susceptibility-as-a-promising-marker-for-predicting-future-severity-of-Parkinsons-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Magnetic-susceptibility-as-a-promising-marker-for-predicting-future-severity-of-Parkinsons-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f9f2905-732c-4fca-acf9-9d2f7d1f85d8 Tue, 18 Jul 2023 08:20:00 -0400 Magnetic susceptibility as a promising marker for predicting future severity of Parkinson's disease
免疫诊断：释放个性化免疫治疗的潜力研究人员讨论了免疫诊断的概念，并探索了人工智能在 ID 系统中用于精准肿瘤免疫治疗的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Immunodiagnosis-Unleashing-the-potential-of-personalized-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Immunodiagnosis-Unleashing-the-potential-of-personalized-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=893791f0-9352-451d-9d11-604a553dde69 Tue, 18 Jul 2023 08:10:00 -0400 Immunodiagnosis: Unleashing the potential of personalized immunotherapy
肺康复对常见阻塞性肺疾病患者睡眠效率的影响研究人员研究了肺康复对常见阻塞性肺病患者睡眠效率的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/The-impact-of-pulmonary-rehabilitation-on-sleep-efficiency-of-病人-with-common-obstructive-pulmonary-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/The-impact-of-pulmonary-rehabilitation-on-sleep-efficiency-of-病人-with-common-obstructive-pulmonary-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4becee3c-9a77-45b3-babb-4833f08379e6 Tue, 18 Jul 2023 07:59:00 -0400 The impact of pulmonary rehabilitation on sleep efficiency of patients with common obstructive pulmonary disease
